What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Select "zachsoulsister" deck in DeckChooserScreen.
2. Click on Deck View action.
3. Click on "Other Spells" action.

This deck has no cards in the "Other Spells" category.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Deck generates NPE in deck view.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on July 08, 2014 14:53:16_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Select "zachsoulsister" deck in DeckChooserScreen.
2. Click on Deck View action.
3. Click on "Other Spells" action.

This deck has no cards in the "Other Spells" category.
